text: Kathryn Dawn Lang, better known as k.d. lang (born November 2, 1961), is a Canadian country and pop singer-songwriter and guitarist. Her best known hit is "Constant Craving". She has contributed songs to many movie soundtracks. Lang was born in Edmonton, Alberta. She is openly lesbian'Middle years' and is an activist for LGBT rights. == References == Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian guitarists Category:Canadian LGBT people Category:Canadian pop musicians Category:Canadian singer-songwriters Category:Country musicians Category:Canadian activists Category:Entertainers from Edmonton Category:Lesbians Category:LGBT rights activists Category:LGBT singers Category:LGBT songwriters Category:Canadian pop singers Category:Country singers Category:Warner Bros. title: K.d. lang
